explanation: [0-0] A woman in a white printed nightgown and green apron stands at the stove, her right hand wearing a disposable glove and holding something to her mouth, while her left hand holds a red spatula. The kitchen floor is covered in white tiles with gray and green leaf patterns. The kitchen cabinets are blue with white countertops. A pot filled with green vegetables sits on the stove. Various seasonings and chopped fruits are arranged on the countertop. A person wearing black slippers can be seen in the lower-left corner.

[0-4] The woman in the white nightgown stirs the vegetables in the pot with a spatula in her left hand, while eating something. A man in blue pajamas with a green print walks in from the right. He puts on a disposable glove on his left hand and takes something from a plate. The woman in the white nightgown turns around, startling the man, causing him to drop the item. The man picks it up and walks to the right. Then the camera moves to a right hand holding a green tool and a left hand tearing off the tape on the back of the green tool.
